title: Meet Our Esteemed Chief Guest
description: Mr. Abhay Vaidya, Director at Pune International Centre (PIC). With over three decades in journalism, including a stint as a Foreign Correspondent in Washington D.C. for The Times of India, Mr. Vaidya brings a wealth of global experience. As Resident Editor for DNA's Pune Edition, he showcased impactful storytelling. A fervent advocate for sustainable development, his LEAD, UK Fellowship underpins his commitment to environmental discourse. Currently mentoring at esteemed universities, Mr. Vaidya's dedication to nurturing future journalists embodies the essence of Model United Nations.
